results:
I've performed the web search for your query about interactive storytelling, choose your own adventure, TikTok AR filters, size changing apps, gamification, and literature. Here's what I found:

## Interactive Storytelling & Choose Your Own Adventure

Choose Your Own Adventure-type narratives allow users to decide how the story develops, harnessing the power of interactive stories in which users' decisions shape the narrative. This technique allows the audience to make choices that affect the outcome of the story, creating a more intense brand experience and strengthening brand identification.

## TikTok Interactive Features

TikTok has introduced several interactive storytelling formats:

### Story Selection
TikTok's Story Selection is a new interactive format introduced by the platform to strengthen relationships between brands and creators. Story Selection is an interactive add-on that provides a story-selection function for in-feed ads and lets audiences choose the next video that they want to watch. The Story Selection format invites users to interactively participate in the development of an ad's story.

### AR Filters and Effects
TikTok's interactive filters work similarly to some of the augmented reality (AR) filters you may have seen trending on Snapchat and Instagram. Some of these filters include the popular AR predictor filters, interactive games, or moving filters that are customizable. TikTok Effect House allows creators to create imaginary worlds, virtual characters, games, filters, sounds, and more, including full, interactive effects in just a few clicks.

## Gamification in Storytelling

Interactive storytelling combines gamification and storytelling marketing to create immersive brand experiences that foster connections and strengthen long-term brand loyalty. Gamification introduces gamelike capabilities into traditional venues, with video games permitting solving puzzles, engaging play in simulated venues that provide challenges.

## Educational Applications

Nonlinear storytelling with gamification can dramatically improve learning in online education. Through personalized narratives, emotional connections, gamification, and collaborative features, edutainment startups are harnessing the power of storytelling to make education more enjoyable, effective, and impactful.

## Literary Context

Interactive fiction can refer to literary works that are not read in a linear fashion, known as gamebooks, where the reader is instead given choices at different points in the text. The most famous example of this form of printed fiction is the Choose Your Own Adventure book series.

The search revealed a rich ecosystem of interactive storytelling tools and techniques spanning from traditional literature to modern social media platforms, with particular emphasis on how TikTok is innovating in this space through AR filters and interactive ad formats.
